name: Cybernetic Eye, Imaging Radar (TL-13)
description:
The imaging radar cybernetic eye contains a millimeter wave radar transmitter and processor unit with fine enough resolution for image formation. The imaging radar has a range of 300 meters and is not degraded by any atmospheric effects. This version of the cybernetic eye has a single-function and is easily recognizable as a mechanical implant.

In all cases, the cyber eye also includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.
